casebody.data:
Before Fitzsimons, Ch. J., and Conlan, J.

Elihu B. Frost, as Assignee, etc., Appellant, v. The Weehawken Wharf Company, Respondent. Appeal from an order of the City Court of the city of New York denying plaintiff’s motion to amend complaint. Norman G. Johnson, for appellant; wilder & Anderson (Frederick E. Anderson, of counsel), for respondent. Order appealed from affirmed, with costs.

No opinion.
